00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"

00029 #include "KviKvsEventTable.h"
00030 #include "KviKvsEventManager.h"
00031 #include "KviKvsVariantList.h"

00033 //
00034 // KVS Macros for triggering events
00035 //
00036 // KviKvsVariantList vParams;
00037 // vParams.append(bSomething);
00038 // vParams.append(iSomething);
00039 // vParams.append(szSomething);
00040 // KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT(KviEvent_OnSomething,pSomeWindow,&vParams)
00041 //
00042 // if(KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_HALTED(KviEvent_OnSomething,pSomeWindow,&vParams))
00043 //     msg->haltOutput()
00044 //
00045 //
00046 
00047 // These two allow reusing the parameter lists (but may require more code)
00048 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT(__idx,__wnd,__parms) \
00049         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \
00050                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,__parms);
00051 
00052 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_HALTED(__idx,__wnd,__parms) \
00053         (KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx) ? \
00054                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,__parms) : false)
00055 
00056 
00057 // These require less code (but param lists can't be reused)
00058 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_0(__idx,__wnd) \
00059         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \
00060         { \
00061                 KviKvsVariantList _vLocalParamList; \
00062                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,&_vLocalParamList); \
00063         }
00064 
00065 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_1(__idx,__wnd,__param1) \
00066         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \
00067         { \
00068                 KviKvsVariantList _vLocalParamList( \
00069                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param1) \
00070                         ); \
00071                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,&_vLocalParamList); \
00072         }
00073 
00074 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_2(__idx,__wnd,__param1,__param2) \
00075         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \
00076         { \
00077                 KviKvsVariantList _vLocalParamList( \
00078                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param1), \
00079                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param2) \
00080                         ); \
00081                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,&_vLocalParamList); \
00082         }
00083 
00084 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_3(__idx,__wnd,__param1,__param2,__param3) \
00085         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \
00086         { \
00087                 KviKvsVariantList _vLocalParamList( \
00088                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param1), \
00089                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param2), \
00090                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param3) \
00091                         ); \
00092                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,&_vLocalParamList); \
00093         }
00094 
00095 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_4(__idx,__wnd,__param1,__param2,__param3,__param4) \
00096         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \
00097         { \
00098                 KviKvsVariantList _vLocalParamList( \
00099                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param1), \
00100                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param2), \
00101                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param3), \
00102                                 new KviKvsVariant(__param4) \
00103                         ); \
00104                 KviKvsEventManager::instance()->trigger(__idx,__wnd,&_vLocalParamList); \
00105         }
00106

00135         if(KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx)) \

00150 #define KVS_TRIGGER_EVENT_0_HALTED(__idx,__wnd) \
00151         ( \
00152                         KviKvsEventManager::instance()->hasAppHandlers(__idx) \
00153                 ? \
00154                         KviKvsEventManager::instance()->triggerDeleteParams( \
00155                                         __idx, \
00156                                         __wnd, \
00157                                         new KviKvsVariantList() \
00158                                 ) \
00159                 : \
00160                         false \
00161         )
00162

00167                         KviKvsEventManager::instance()->triggerDeleteParams( \

00170                                         new KviKvsVariantList( \
00171                                                         new KviKvsVariant(__param1) \
00172                                                 ) \
00173                                 ) \
00174                 : \
00175                         false \
00176         )
